story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 IntercontinentalExchange Inc. (ICE.N) said on Wednesday that ICE Futures reached record annual volume for the ninth consecutive year, with traded contract volume exceeding 2005 levels by more than 120 percent. Average daily commissions in ICE's OTC business segment increased 89 percent for the year, and cleared OTC volume rose 131 percent to a new record.
story.title: ice futures volume rise 120 pct in record year
